meanings: moreover, furthermore, in addition to this[that], what is worse, to make matters worse, worse still, on top of(it)

vlive.korean: [솔직히 가뜩이나 웃긴데 마끄리 따라웃다가 광대에 쥐난 적 있다 없다?] [It's honestly so funny... How can just stare at Mark laughing?] View video V PICK! : [NCT] 말로 짜티 끓이는 마끄와 푸두에 내 잇몸 지금 물 다뺀 뻑뻑한 짜티야 (So cute MARK&HAECHAN)
